alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Taylor County through 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawkins, or 20 miles east of Ladysmith, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chelsea and Westboro around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include The Mondeaux Flowage and County Roads D And N. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Wisconsin.
